Text:
So surprised to see that there's not a single comment on this torrent! It's a rare gem by Pedro Costa. If not for TPB we would have never seen this in India. So thank you uploader and the seeders. Video quality is a litlle low for the size, maybe the graininess is used as a style by the filmmaker. Download was a little slow in the beginning. Seeding now.
